goal.name: Market Research Agent
goal.description: Analyze market trends and generate reports
goal.success_criteria: Successfully retrieved data and generated a summary

nodes.name: Market Analyzer
nodes.system_prompt: You are a market analyst. Analyze the user request and extract key topics for research. output_keys: [research_query, focus_area]

nodes.name: Web Searcher
nodes.system_prompt: Use the web_search tool to find latest information about: {research_query}

nodes.name: Report Generator
nodes.system_prompt: Synthesize the search results into a professional market research report. output_keys: [final_report]
